source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 953,458 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 347,946.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Gauntlets of Fractured Eons

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,665 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 202 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Mister Pick-Me-Up for 6 sec, firing a healing beam every 2 sec that jumps between 5 injured allies to restore 135,739 health each.

Overhealing from this effect irradiates allies to deal Nature damage to nearby enemies over 1.5 sec, increased by additional overhealing.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Greatmantle of the Highlord

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,345 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
